item.title: Voice Training Compilation
item.description: Ember’s compilation of voice training tips and guides Most of these are for voice feminization, but the techniques can be used the other way In no particular order: Voice Quills’ twitter thread (Nitter mirror) Trans voice lessons (youtube channel) L’s voice training guide (Reddit) AmaRoseLessons (youtube channel) The ‚ÄúOne-Step‚Äù To PERFECT Voice Feminization (youtube video) Solid introductory voice training resources (r/transvoice pinned post)
item.content:encoded:
Ember’s compilation of voice training tips and guides

Most of these are for voice feminization, but the techniques can be used the other way

In no particular order:

  • Voice Quills’ twitter thread (Nitter mirror)
  • Trans voice lessons (youtube channel)
  • L’s voice training guide (Reddit)
  • AmaRoseLessons (youtube channel)
  • The ‚ÄúOne-Step‚Äù To PERFECT Voice Feminization (youtube video)
  • Solid introductory voice training resources (r/transvoice pinned post)

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: This site does not collect your data or display any ads, however this site is behind cloudflare. so read their privacy policy. Javascript is only for the lightmode/darkmode toggle and search, the rest of the site is 100% functional without javascript
item.content:encoded:
This site does not collect your data or display any ads, however this site is behind cloudflare. so read their privacy policy.

Javascript is only for the lightmode/darkmode toggle and search, the rest of the site is 100% functional without javascript
